title: Writing in Standard Form
text: We can write this parabola in standard form by multiplying both sides by $$36$$ to get $$36x=y^2$$
speech: We can write this parabola in standard form by multiplying both sides by , 36  to get  36 x, is equal to y squared

title: Finding The Characteristics
text: From the equation, we know that the vertex is $$(0,0)$$ and that $$p=9$$. This means that the focus is $$(9,0)$$ and the directrix is $$x=-9$$
